content: Yes and yes. I once worked for a big company which, besides all the corporate indoctrination you so accurately described, tried to show you the benefits… let me rephrase that… convince you… nope… push you to buy all the products which the company produced and sold. Fun times! Nowadays I think I’m ok with the balance Bullshit/Personal Benefits, and do stuff that I mostly like. Still, to not lose my mind in corporate America, I moved into a mental framework of considering work as a necessary resource-gathering period between vacation trips.
